main event: A UFO sighting occurred on August 20, 1965, in Amityville, New York, observed for approximately 25-30 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a civilian source., The object was observed visually from the ground., The number of confirmed objects was one., The conclusion of the report was listed as N/C (No Conclusion)., Physical evidence was noted.
sighted object: one oblong object with a dark spot in the center
witness description: a 17-year-old male student who sounded sober and sincere
